data.message: I really hate this new thing where when one of my friends posts a new picture, I instead see on my newsfeed a picture they posted several days ago. I don't want to see something that was posted yesterday, I already saw it. I would like to see the pictures they are posting now. Can we please fix this? It's very annoying.
